com.mps.dsp.core

Class ConnStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mps.dsp.core.ConnStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Create a connection stream between a sender node and a receiver node. It opens socket connection to send message to the receiver node via tcp connection stream.
    Author:
    msingh
